segments.text: Hi , I'm back ! Hmm ... your hair is pretty damaged , and you've got split ends .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the trim should fix the split ends , but you might need a deep conditioning treatment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Umm , OK . Whatever you think will help .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm also going to add some layers to frame your face .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you use the thinning shears on top , too ? My hair is really thick .
